LanguageData.DirtyEthanol.label: moonshine
LanguageData.DirtyEthanol.description: Dirty Ethanol is an organic compound with many side effects.
LanguageData.Ethanol.label: Ethanol
LanguageData.Ethanol.description: Ethanol is an organic compound belonging to the class of monohydric alcohols. Under standard conditions, ethanol is a volatile, flammable, colorless, transparent liquid with a characteristic odor and pungent taste. Active ingredient in alcoholic beverages.
